panels.description: This is the global overview of all wireless traffic coming from and going to the access points.
panels.title: Traffic on the air

panels.description:
This is the global overview of all wireless traffic coming from and going to the access points.

If this graph spikes up relative to the traffic numbers, you might see degraded overall throughput.
panels.title: Packets on the air

panels.description: This is the global overview of all traffic coming from and going to the access points through the wired network.
panels.title: Traffic on the wire

panels.description:
This is the global overview of all packets coming from and going to the access points through the wired network.

If this graph spikes up relative to the traffic numbers, you might see degraded overall throughput.
panels.title: Packets on the wire

panels.description: If any device is consistently above the others, this might indicate a problem. Consider rebooting that device, upgrading it, or putting another one nearby to reduce load.
panels.title: Worst 3 response times by devices
